Title: Relates to the effectiveness of certain provisions relating to excluding certain food donations from sales tax
Summary: Relates to the effectiveness of certain provisions relating to excluding certain food donations from sales tax to July 1, 2026.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.2279 & A.4216)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the tax law relating to excluding certain food donations from sales tax, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 2279 and A. 4216, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
